item.title: Github Pages
item.description: How to Deploy OpenAPI specs using Github Pages Enable github Pages First step is to enable gh-pages for your repository Next Select Pages from Settings menu of your repository Select visibility Public/Private based on who you wants to share your API specs Next Select Deploy from branch option in source Next select branch and directory where your API specs is available. Optionally you can select Theme and Custom domain. When you will specify custom domain gh-pages will be deploy using custom domain instead of ardbp.
